sense.def:
The making of something
je dejanje ali postopek, s katerim nekaj ustvarimo.

seg.quote: At the end of his life he turned to the making of beautiful books.
People should be involved in all decision-making which affects them.

sense.def:
Če je težava
of one's own making
, jo je tisti človek povzročil sam.

seg.quote: The trouble here is of the President's own making.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
is the making of a person or thing
, je vzrok za to, da je tista oseba ali stvar uspešna.

seg.quote: The description of Belfast is the making of the book.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da ima oseba ali stvar
the makings of something
, pomeni, da se nam zdi, da se bo razvila na določen način.

seg.quote: She perceived that here might be the makings of the friendship that had so eluded her.
